short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab background with a beautiful nature wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tag Tab Club - browser extension that opens accessibility features for setting up a new tabs.

Features:

1. Wallpapers
Instead of a boring default background, there will be beautiful nature wallpapers in HD resolution.

2. Shortcuts
The ability to go to important sites in one click.

3. Search
Quick access to the search bar.

By installing and using Tag Tab Club, you automatically accept the Terms of Use https://tagtabclub.com/terms.html and the Privacy Policy https://tagtabclub.com/privacy.html.
